thread.section_title: Hotel Soft - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Charming hotel
thread.title_full: Charming hotel - Review of Hotel Soft, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Julie S
title: Charming hotel
text:
Just spent 3 nights in this lovely hotel, situated nicely for the tourist thing (about 1 mile walk to notra dame, 3 miles to Eiffel Tower).
Our room.
Small but clean. The small didn't bother us, any city hotel we have stayed in has been small. The important thing, the room was spotless. Housekeeping pops in every day to freshen up.
Staff.
I actually don't think I have come across any friendlier, helpful, happy staff. They are a credit to the hotel. Nothing is to much trouble. I would like to say the gentleman on reception all day Saturday/Sunday (unfortunately didn't get his name) was amazing.
If we were to visit Paris again we wouldn't hesitate to stay here.
